results.title: Modulation of the IGF system and proliferation in human endometrial stromal cells by metformin: a dose-dependent effect.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ might therefore influence locally the endometrial proliferation and maturation, and could open up new treatment options for @<m>DISEASE_Genital_Diseases_Female</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005831 @@@gynecological diseases@@@ by vaginal application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
